title: Bayani
description: Ka koyi yadda  Pecky yake aiki,  Pecky token ne na al'umma a Supra ba tare da team tokens ba. Ka fahimci yadda muke ∆ôona Pecky ta hanyar ajiya, NFT royalties, da PeckyBot.
ogDescription: Koyan yadda pecky ke aiki, token na al'umma 100%  a Supra ba tare da team tokens ba.
introText:
Pecky ya fito ne daga tarin ChickenWings NFT.
Pecky token ne na gaskiya mallakin al'umma 100% ba tare da team tokens ba. Ri∆ôe Peckys …óinka da ∆ôarfi, domin muna ∆ôona duk abin da muka samu!

staking.title: AJIYA
staking.description:
Yi ajiya da $SUPRA a Meridian node ka samu ladan 8% kamar ko'ina,
amma kuma za ka samu adadin $Pecky iri …óaya da SUPRA …óinka kowace rana!
Mafi kyau ma: 50% na ladan node ana amfani da su don saya da ∆ôona $Pecky!

nfts.title: NFTs
nfts.description:
Dukkan NFTs da aka sayar a kasuwar Crystara suna da kudin royalty 5%.
Maimakon mu ri∆ôe su, muna amfani da kowane ku…ói don sayan pecky da kuma ∆ôona Pecky din!

peckybot.title: PECKYBOT
peckybot.description:
A Discord, bot …óinmu yana taimaka wa masu cinikin NFT da aika sanarwa nan take idan:
‚Ä¢ wani yayi tayin NFT …óinka
‚Ä¢ an saka NFT daga manyan tarin ∆ôasa da farashin da ka saita
Dukkan Pecky da aka yi amfani da su a bot ana aika su kai tsaye zuwa wuta inda Ake ∆ôonawa!

questionsText: Kana da tambaya? Shiga Discord …óinmu ko ka same mu a X!
